root.title: Ottuq Dash III (е-54)
root.names: Второй памятник с Оттук-Даша 504
root.place: Three steles, grey sandstones found near the mountain Ottuq-Dash, the left coast of river Ulug-Kem, in 30 km below the mouth of river Elegest.
root.store: Delivered by researchers of Tyva museum and Tyva Scientific and Researches Institute of Language, Literature and History (ТНИИЯЛИ) to the Tyva museum.
root.general: 1 жол мәтін кеңінен атыздалып шамамен 10 таңба арқылы қашалған. Тастың бір бетіне ұзына бойы жазылған.
root.description: The stele almost square in section, almost not polished. The top is destroyed. The surface is covered by mineral formations. There is 1 line of text on all length of the stele and a sign.
root.size: Height – 100 cm, length – 27 cm, width – 25 cm
root.investigation: Found in 1961. History of finding and researches are made by L.R.Kyzlasov 506. I.A.Batmanov, Kunaa A.C., Z.B.Aragachi, G.F.Babushkin 502 investigated.

pdf.f_title: Памятники тюркской рунической письменности азиатского ареала.

refs.ref: Inscriptions de l'Ienissei recueillies publiees par la Societe Finlandaise d'Archeologie. Helsingfors. 1889.
Малов С.Е.Енисейская письменности тюрков. М.-Л., 1952. С.20.
